articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Trump threatens 200% tariff on French wines as Macron reportedly snubs 'Board of Peace' seat - CNBC
articles.description: Trump also reiterated his plans to control Greenland, saying that European leaders "won't push back too much."
articles.content: U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday threatened to impose 200% tariffs on French wines and champagne after French President Emmanuel Macron was reported to be unwilling to join his "Board of Peace"… [+2347 chars]

articles.author: Abhishek Vishnoi
articles.title: Citi Downgrades European Stocks on US Friction Over Greenland - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Citigroup Inc. strategist who called European stocks’ outperformance has turned more cautious on the region, citing worsening relations between Brussels and Washington over President Donald Trump’s push to seize Greenland.
articles.content: The Citigroup Inc. strategist who called European stocks outperformance has turned more cautious on the region, citing worsening relations between Brussels and Washington over President Donald Trumps… [+253 chars]
